For every integer $ n\ge 2$, let $ \text{pow}(n)$ be the largest power of the largest prime that divides $ n$. For example $ \text{pow}(144)=\text{pow}(2^4\cdot 3^2)=3^2$. What is the largest integer $ m$ such that $ 2010^m$ divides\\
\[ \prod_{n=2}^{5300}\text{pow}(n)\text{?}\]\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 74 \qquad \textbf{(B)}\ 75 \qquad \textbf{(C)}\ 76 \qquad \textbf{(D)}\ 77 \qquad \textbf{(E)}\ 78$
